titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of a Borrower's Card: Dorothy Shelley

msIdentifier.repository: Princeton University. Library. Dept. of Rare Books and Special Collections

change.ab: s1: Changed "Roque" to "Rogue" in address s2: Changed to "Anthony" s6: Encoded "June 31" as "1939-06-30" since TEI wouldn't take invalid date
s2: April 19 Adverse s3: July 13 The . s5: 2 Nov. Modern

div.head:
SHELLEY 1933
Mrs Dorothy 6 rue Armand Moisant15e Moisant
Omouville-La Rogue par Beaumont-Hague (Manche)
To June 15th, 1939 SHELLEY
div.note: Renewed 6 m. 2 v. A June 1st - Dec 1st. 39 180
p.c. Oct 10 asking if would like books sent reply Oct. 26 would like some books is returning all except rare editions
p 6,20 Three Men in a Boat Dusk at the Grove
Renewed November 30 1935 - May 30 1936 Jan 8. Cheque 100 fr postage
Renewed 6 m 2 v A Dec 31st - June 31st 1939 180 v/ will send check Jan 3

div.head: 1936. SHELLEY.
div.ab: Aug. 3rd. Oscar Wilde Discovers America. Aug. 24
Sept. 21 White Horses of Vienna. Oct 13
Oct 13 Faithful Lovers. total p.10.40 Oct 29
Ap. 27 Invitation to the Waltz. May 10

div.head: 1939 SHELLEY (Cardinaux)
div.note: sent p.c. Jan 15 asking for Three 13 P.L. wrote Jan 11th also also Feb 7 Feb 13 all returned except The Egoist Diana of the Crossways Children of the Ghetto

div.head:
1937. SHELLEY
Mademoiselle Denise Cardinaux. Omonville la Rogue par Beaumont - Hague (Marche)
div.note: dated July 14th received cheque for Frs 60 July 16 3m. 2v. 60v.00. paid. July 16th 1937
send S Joan by Shaw when it comes back
